name: Journey Of Panda Mage: Destiny of Brave Panda
name_original: Journey Of Panda Mage: Destiny of Brave Panda
description:
An evil has attacked the peaceful lands and is using all his powers to turn all the good into evil and spreading his darkness everywhere on the land of joy and peace. He is turning everything in his sight into darkness, good into evil. The green lands turned barren and he wishes to take over the world with his dark force. All hope seemed lost until a brave young panda sear rises from the holy land of pandas and decides to take on the evil and vanquish the darkness from the land and save the world from this threat with his magic of all the elements.

Journey of panda sear presents a very magical and fun gameplay. Enjoy more than 200 levels of element crushing magical fun.

The game play is very simple yet interesting where you have to match more than 3 of the same elements to crush them. The more elements you gather and destroy at once the bigger effect you get. Every time you destroy an element you get mana power which gathers in the magical orb and as it reaches the limit, It shoots magical fire ball on to other elements and destroys them.

There are 3 types of hurdles that you have to clear in order to release the star of purity from lock. There are spider webs and stone bricks that block your way. Each requires different number of elements to be cleared.

Complete mission of newbies, experience the real fun of Journey of Panda Mage!
The most pop crush gameplay!
help the panda pop all obstacles!
Classy graphics, amazing special effects and cute panda mascot!

As you progress in your journey, you grid starts to become filled with more and more elements. There are a total of 7 types.

There are different types of magical powers that allow you to dostoy lots of them at once.
Help the mage to fight against the evil using all his knowledge and power of magic and release the holy land of pandas from the darkness and vanquish the force of evil.

Enjoy the legend of a panda!
